content: Just a suggestion: It may be that the folder is threaded. You can check that by clicking view>sort by and see if 'threading' is ticked. If the menu bar isn't shown, click alt key and then click view>sort by
creator: davidsk

content: On the Calendar tab, File/Print..., select events and/or tasks, choose the time period, then select Microsoft Print to pdf as the printer.
creator: sfhowes

Kliknutím na tlačítko Povolit povolíte této aplikaci a Googlu používat informace v souladu s jejich příslušnými zásadami ochrany soukromí. Toto a další oprávnění účtu můžete kdykoli změnit.

content:
Zkusil bych v Thunderbirdu smazat heslo pro přihlášení do gmailu. Při novém přihlášení heslo znovu zadat a zatrhnout možnost něco jako "Zapamatovat, nebo Už se neptat".

Anebo je to nějaká nová ptákovina, kde se Google snaží uživatele jenom otrávit. Například tím, že v nastavení účtu Gmail je potřeba povolit tzv. "nedůvěryhodné" aplikace, tzn. i Thunderbird..

content:
I thought it was just me. Last month I set up an on premise test IMAP server, and was able to connect Thunderbird with no issues.

A month later I move that VM to a different location, and was not able to connect Thunderbird. I thought maybe it was something to do with moving it to a different location/subnet, so I stood up brand new IMAP server.

Still no luck connecting Thunderbird. If I run a test, I get the green checkmark, but if I click 'Done', I get Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password.

Server side, the message I get is "Connection closed: terminating connection", which generally indicates client side issue.

I ran some wireshark on the server side and client side. Server side, I get (placeholders in x): 695 10.673646 192.168.x.me 192.168.x.server TLSv1.2 85 Encrypted Alert

Client side, I get: 824 9.293752 192.168.x.me 192.168.x.server SMTP 87 C: EHLO we-guess.mozilla.org | QUIT 825 9.307994 192.168.x.server 192.168.x.me TCP 60 25 → 65034 [ACK] Seq=109 Ack=34 Win=32735 Len=0 827 9.323814 192.168.x.server 192.168.x.me SMTP 99 S: 501 Syntax error in parameters or arguments

1045 13.690488 192.168.x.me 192.168.x.server TLSv1.2 85 Encrypted Alert 1046 13.690509 192.168.x.me 192.168.x.server TCP 54 65035 → 143 [FIN, ACK] Seq=1029 Ack=1369 Win=261376 Len=0 (This frame initiates the connection closing).
creator: maynardinc

content:
Ciao,

  • anzitutto questo è solo un forum per gli utenti non un supporto tecnico. capisco la tua urgenza ma siamo tutti solo volontari
  • a quando risale l'ultimo backup della posta che hai ha disposizione?
  • se il backup è molto vecchio, fanne subito uno nuovo come spiegato qui -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo
  • i tuoi account di posta in Thunderbird sono configurati come POP3 o IMAP?
  • tramite webmail, la posta è ancora presente sul server?
  • chi è il fornitore della/e casella/e email?
creator: @next

content: Just above the message list pane, you should normally see the 'quick filter' button. to its right is a small icon.. Click that and select 'table view'
creator: davidsk

content: I'm not seeing any small icon to the right of the Quick Filter. (Screenshot attached).

content:
FOUND IT (in a reply you made in another post)

View > Layout > Message List Header

Thanks.
creator: mozilla609

content: ok, the message list header seems to have been disabled. if menu bar is not shown, click alt key. then, click view>layout and tick the 'message list header' . Then, click that icon to change to table view.
creator: davidsk
